features.name: Shared Inbox
features.description: Manage customer communications through a unified inbox that supports email and live chat.

features.name: Live Chat
features.description: Engage with customers in real-time through live chat support.

features.name: Self-service Knowledge Base
features.description: Provide customers with self-service options through a comprehensive knowledge base.

features.name: Proactive Messaging
features.description: Send proactive messages to customers to enhance engagement and support.

features.name: Omnichannel Support
features.description: Support customers across multiple channels including email, chat, and more.

features.name: Automation
features.description: Automate repetitive tasks to improve efficiency and response times.

features.name: Mobile Access
features.description: Access support tools and manage customer interactions on mobile devices.

features.name: Reporting and Analytics
features.description: Gain insights into support performance with detailed reporting and analytics.

integration: 50+ integrations including a robust API for seamless operations.
support: Excellent customer support praised for being responsive and helpful.
scalability: Designed to scale with businesses as they grow, supporting increasing customer interactions.
customization: Some challenges reported in customizing the interface to specific business needs.

reviews_pros.description: User-friendly interface that is easy to navigate.
Excellent customer support that goes above and beyond.
Effective email management for businesses relying on email communication.
Collaboration tools that enhance team productivity.

reviews_cons.description: Limited advanced features compared to competitors.
Performance issues with the Android app.
Pricing concerns with increasing prices and changes to service plans.
